overview: As soon as the former truck driver has crossed the various bridges over the Elbe, he would preferably turn around immediately and return home, to the Steinburg district in Schleswig-Holstein. There he’s been converting an old farmhouse for himself and his small family for ten years now. In the end, he sees himself rewarded by the beauty of the living space. Yet he is not just content, but also discontent. With friends, he undertakes a boat ride on board the “Kehrwieder” into the rough Danish waters.
title: Hinter den Elbbrücken
